Class Phonebook

  • java.lang.Object
    • Phonebook

  • public class Phonebook
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Phonebook() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addContact()
      This method needs no parameters which ask the user to enter info and creates a contact and put it into the array of contacts, and returns void.
      static void afterSearch(int type)
      This method takes one parameter(integer type of operation after the search done)type=0 for only search,type=1 for search and edit, type=2 for search and delete, and returns void.
      static void deleteContact(int contactPos)
      This method takes a parameter (integer the index of contact in the phone book array) and deletes it from the array and shifts all the contacts to fit right in place after deletion, and returns void.
      static void editContact(int contactPos)
      This method takes a parameter (integer the index of the contact in the array of phone book) and allows the user to change the info of the contact, and returns void.
      static void load()
      This method takes no parameters and reads all the contacts from an external file and calls the constructor of contacts class and generates the array with all contacts in the program.
      static void printPhoneBook()
      This method takes no parameter and prints all the contacts in the array phone book, and returns void nothing
      static java.lang.String readWithBuf()
      This method reads with buffer reader and returns a string containing the line entered by user
      static void save()
      This method takes no parameters, and it prints the array phone book into an external file, and returns void.
      static void search(int type)
      This method takes a parameter (integer the type of operation the search is needed for) type=0 for only search,type=1 for search and edit, type=2 for search and delete, and returns void.
      static void searchByFirst(int type)
      This method takes one parameter (integer type of operation after search) and return void.
      static void searchByLast(int type)
      This method takes one parameter (integer type of operation after search) and return void.
      static void searchByPhone(int type)
      This method takes one parameter (integer type of operation after search) and return void.

      • afterSearch

        public static void afterSearch(int type)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        This method takes one parameter(integer type of operation after the search done)type=0 for only search,type=1 for search and edit, type=2 for search and delete, and returns void. And calls the delete and edit methods.
        Parameters:
        this - is a parameter that determines the action needed after
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • save

        public static void save()
        This method takes no parameters, and it prints the array phone book into an external file, and returns void.

      • load

        public static void load()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This method takes no parameters and reads all the contacts from an external file and calls the constructor of contacts class and generates the array with all contacts in the program.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
